name: Shattered Stone
description:
Shattered Stone is an arcade-style archery game. You shoot golems on floating islands with arrows (hooray!).

Shattered Stone is a game of dexterity. You are an archer tasked to . . .

"Travel throughout the lateral dimension . . . free its energy for our own expansion . . . "

Current Features
  • 5 Arrow Types To Kill Golems With
  • 3 Perks To Unlock
  • 45+ Scenarios To Rank In
  • Various Level Mechanics And Areas
  • Partial Controller Support
  • Archery Goodness
